original_text: I will remove you from your job. You will no longer be an important officer in the palace. I will remove you from your job. You will no longer be an important officer in the palace.
korean_text: 내가 너를 네 관직에서 쫓아내며 네 지위에서 낮추리니

sentences.original_text: I will remove you from your job.
You will no longer be an important officer
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 더 이상 중요한 관원이 되지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will remove you from your job.
You will no longer be an important officer
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 더 이상 중요한 관원이 되지 않을 것이다.
